title: Getting dificulty to play LoL
body: For the past month (when i started back to play) I've been getting disconnected from games from the start for no reason,or the loading screen would freeze on me. If i somehow miraculously manage to reconnect, my team would always be ever so hopeful and patient to wait two minutes before forfeiting. Has anyone experienced this or any idea whats going on,furthermore how to fix it?

replies.body:
Disconnections are commonly caused by an *unstable connection* to the gameservers, so I'd strongly recommend we investigate into your network settings. Most of these issues can be resolved by working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your local settings are configured for League.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.
Applied most of them,didn't fix. Froze at the end of champ select (which is new for me) and my fps is worse than my gameplay. I'm bronze 5 right now.

Since those steps didn't resolve your issue, we'll need to take a deep look at your system logs to troubleshoot further. I recommend running some system logs with our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then I suggest attaching those logs to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our tech specialists can get back in touch with you.

Let me know if you run into any issues completing those steps.

okay,dial it back the first phase worked,i had a temporary laptop issue,figured it out,although there was this one time i got disconnected after the loading screen,but it works great now,thanks for the help!

im having issues where the client freezes in champ select. I can chat to other players on my friends list my whole time but this happening every once in a while is very frustrating. How do i get rid of the beta client and why is it even in beta with so many issues?
